Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Foot Diseases/Foot Ulcer
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Ulcer/Leg Ulcer/Foot Ulcer
Record.Description: Lesion on the surface of the skin of the foot, usually accompanied by inflammation. The lesion may become infected or necrotic and is frequently associated with diabetes or leprosy.
